Claims.Text: machines make work easy and smooth
The negative effects on health can be put on the back seat
the usage of machines is harmful for health of humans
using machines makes daily tasks less time consuming and less cumbersome

Premises.Text: there are many other ways to exercise and stay healthy
machines decrease the work done by people
in many institutions staircases are replaced by lifts now a days
People opt for elevators instead of climbing one or two flight of stairs
It is confirmed in a number of researches that daily usage of elevators in workplaces promotes obesity
this example clearly shows the linkage between using machines and adverse health effects
The work of chopping, blending, grating, kneading has become so easy that people can not imagine their lives without this simple machine at their homes
usage of machines makes work easier and less time is consumed for doing similar amount of work
Take the example of use of food processors in kitchens
